@graph.headline: Shopify Product Descriptions Advanced AI Prompt With FAQs & Schema
@graph.description: Advanced AI prompt for updating Shopify product descriptions with features, internal links, FAQs, and schema markup using Optizen AI

@graph.name: How to Use Shopify Product Description AI Prompt with FAQs and Schema
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide for implementing advanced AI prompts to update Shopify product descriptions

step.name: Navigate to Product Tab
step.text: Navigate to the 'product' tab in Optizen AI. Search via name or using tags for the product or products you wish to update. Use the check boxes to select the products.

step.name: Select AI Prompt
step.text: Select the 'Product Description Full + Links + FAQs + Schema' from the drop down under the Product Description prompt field. Ensure you are using the prompt repository tab. Be sure to check the box for 'Update this section'. Then click Proceed.

step.name: Execute and Review
step.text: Click Proceed to run the prompt. On completion, check the output using the Log section of the app. You can then choose to keep or restore the update.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Shopify Optimization
hasDefinedTerm.description: Process of improving Shopify store performance through enhanced product descriptions, SEO, and user experience

hasDefinedTerm.name: AI Prompts
hasDefinedTerm.description: Structured instructions given to artificial intelligence systems to generate specific types of content or perform particular tasks

hasDefinedTerm.name: Schema Markup
hasDefinedTerm.description: Structured data vocabulary that helps search engines understand and display content more effectively

hasDefinedTerm.name: Product Descriptions
hasDefinedTerm.description: Detailed text content that describes products in ecommerce stores, including features, benefits, and specifications

hasDefinedTerm.name: Optizen AI
hasDefinedTerm.description: AI-powered application for optimizing Shopify stores through automated content generation and SEO improvements

hasDefinedTerm.name: FAQ Schema
hasDefinedTerm.description: Structured data markup specifically designed for frequently asked questions and their answers

hasDefinedTerm.name: Internal Linking
hasDefinedTerm.description: SEO practice of linking to other pages within the same website to improve navigation and search engine rankings

hasDefinedTerm.name: Ecommerce SEO
hasDefinedTerm.description: Search engine optimization strategies specifically tailored for online retail stores and product pages
